name: pngjs
description: PNG encoder/decoder in pure JS, supporting any bit size & interlace, async & sync with full test suite.

scripts.coverage-report: npm run coverage && istanbul report html
scripts.test: npm run lint && tape test/*-spec.js | tap-dot && node test/run-compare
